channel.title: Letting other people connect to my server
channel.description: ok this is like the dumbest question ever asked, but how do i let other people connect to my server from their computer? i have no-ip.org address. its chandlerscape.no-ip.org. and im pretty sure the port is 43594. what do i do? btw this is a 317.

item.title: Letting other people connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @chandlerethan chandlerethan
item.description:
@chandlerethan wrote:

it still says the same as above…

Read full topic
item.source: Letting other people connect to my server

item.title: Letting other people connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Itz-austin Itz-austin.
item.description:
@Itz-austin wrote:

chandlerethan:

i used port forward.

Try downloading utorrent. Once you have that open the utorrent. Once the utorrent is open do [CTRL+P] at the same site (without the plus obviously. Now, once u have that done, you should see something that says

Port used for incoming connections:
put 43594 in that box and at the bottom click ok.

Then go back to canyouseeme.org and check if ur port is open

Read full topic

item.title: Letting other people connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Itz-austin Itz-austin.
item.description:
@Itz-austin wrote:

chandlerethan:

i know how to forward my port, but if i try to forward my external ip address it says please use a LAN ip. which is my internal ip address. im in computer programming, but i don’t think my education covers networking…

Well how did you portforward? portforward.com or utorrent?

Read full topic

item.title: Letting other people connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @chandlerethan chandlerethan
item.description:
@chandlerethan wrote:

ok so i have my port forwarded on my internal 192.168.1.150 but when i open no ip, the server its using is my external ip address… i’m so confused.
// Error: I could not see your service on 68.58.81.148 on port (43594)
Reason: Connection timed out

Read full topic
item.source: Letting other people connect to my server

item.title: Letting other people connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @Itz-austin Itz-austin.
item.description:
@Itz-austin wrote:

chandlerethan:

ok this is like the dumbest question ever asked, but how do i let other people connect to my server from their computer? i have no-ip.org address. its chandlerscape.no-ip.org. and im pretty sure the port is 43594. what do i do? btw this is a 317.

Well, to check if ur port is open click this http://www.canyouseeme.org/

If it say’s successful then people should be able to connect. Then, you can post ur server on a status page such a mopar status page, runelocus, ect.

Read full topic
item.source: Letting other people connect to my server

item.title: Letting other people connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

You will need to port-forward your server, or use Hamachi.

Read full topic
